Blog.post: ok so ive had some help with my guy prob but i still dont know what to do. and its really driving my crazy you know? well anywho today has been a wierd day the water was shut off for who knows why and i had to clean! but i ohave been talking to my cuz alot and i miss him so much but i do get to see him soon. i am happy and i saw lhea plus when i come back to moms agian i get to see raven wow its all good. but guys still drive me crazy one guy more then the others bye bye

Standing here i wait and see see if you will come to me i wait and wait but no reply you stand so close why do you hide with everything so confusing my mind just doesn't seem rest i want to know how you feel i want to know what is real is the way its supposed to be or is this wrong whats meant to be??

so how are all of you? im good just sitten athome finally dude guys drive me crazy you know that they really do i dont get it but anyway i am so tired im about to fall asleep right here so im going to go now love me

hey guys so i just got done babysitting for a week it was fun the kids were so cute but im glad to be home! plus i get to see my friends tonight its been so long i miss lhea and cassie and kitiara may come jake too. so anywho i guess im going to go lots of love and fairy dust ~*~tink~*~

so it has been forever!!!!!!!!! im sorry its been so long but ive been at my dads and i dont get on the computer so i feel like i havent been on line in like forever i go on mabey every two days for like 5 min well i cant wait till july i get to go to texas i cant wait i miss my cuz so much this week im babysitting the kids are so cute i love them but i have to watch another little boy for a few hours each day his mom was kinda wierd about it i have never babysat some kid before were the parents didnt trust me 100% but hey its all good ok i guess i will go love you all love brittany

ok so its not a real good bye but i most likely will not write for a while sorry but if you ever need to talk just leave a comment and i will try to get back to you ok or you could just e-mail me but whatever you want i love you all love ~*~tink~*~
well my day was good i saw a kid who i like and have never really talked to we talked a little and then i got thrown in the pool fully dressed fun day dont u think well g2g love tink~*~

im good here just sitten at my computer and i thought i would write well i hope all of your guys summer is going good for you all. i know mine has been good. ive seen some people i havent seen in a long time and made some new friends. but hey i havent forgot my friends that i havent seen in forever it seems. dont worry i still love you guys. i have to babysit from the 22-26 all week what fun but i like it plus i get paid. then i cant wait till july im going to texas!!!!!!!! now that will be tonz of fun i get to see my fav cuz and spend time with my aunt. (uncle and other cuz duh) a couple of my friends get to go to way of the country have fun (jake) then a few are just going out of state (to many to name) but what ever you do have fun but yes but be safe i do want to see you all agian (alive) well anywho i guess i better go now but i love you all love ~*~tink~*~

so how are all of you guys??? im good here. well anywho i have a question for you ok how old is to old for a boy/girl friend what age do you draw the line? i know most of you have diffrent ages just write and let me know what you think thanx
hey write or comment to me when you read these so i know whos been here thnx i will try to update alot so check back

ok so we all know the saying cant live withthem cant live without em right?? well its so true!!!!!! have you liked someone so much that you dont know what to do anymore when you see them your so happy you hope its not written all over your face then when you dont see them it feels like forever till you do agian. what ifyou felt like this but you had no clue if the person felt the same. i mean what do you do when it gets like this do you forget about the person cause there is just no use anymore or do you still hold on for just that little chance?? have you ever felt like this????????? well i have to go now ttyl tink ~*~
hey guys this is cool well anywho just wanted to say hi i dont have much to write today love tonz me

when you told me you liked me my heart felt so new when you told me he was stupid i didnt know what to do when you looked in my eyes i couldnt look away when you held me so close everything eles faded away when you kissed my lips only you filled my brian when you said goodbye i just didnt know what to say i have to tell you im not to hooked on you i do still like you but hey its hard not to dont go away i dont want to loss you but what we had i know must go ok i so dont know how to end this.. oh ya im back home and i had a blast in texas. i miss everyone and i am so looking forward to school just to see my people. i hope everyone had a great summer. dude it flew by so fast though oh well i have to go now love bs

im so happy in two hours i will be on the way to the airport to fly to texas! so anywho how are all of you? well i found out one of my friends from church likes me and i dont know how i much i like him but he said hes cool with us just being friends so thats good. i wont have to loss him as a friend cause hes really cool. and hes going to be a senior very cool. j/p! well anyhow only a like 4 weeks or less till school starts. wow this summer has gone by so fast its scary. well i guess i will go now i dont want to but i dont have much more to say. sorry love you all tonz me

so how are you guys? im ok here trying to get over someone takes a while and is not fun. but dallas a little 10 year old is friends with justin's (the guy i like who im not trying to get over) little brother and he said hes gunna tell justin that i like him but i dont care before i would have done something to try and change his mind but i dont care if he knows cause 1. i wont see him much so if he doesnt like me its not going to be all wired and 2. its better for them to know i never realized it but if you think about it if the person you like finds out and doesnt like you like that then you can not waste your time on them and still be friends at the same time you could be liken someone new and if they do you like back then you two can get together so its better and i have to say i dont like admitting that at all cause i dont always want people to know how i feel but anywho im just rambaling on ( i so spelt that wrong) so im going now love me

hey guys how are you all? im good here i just got back from the mall what fun i love that place but there were no hot guys there today so it was just a shopping day and boy did i shop i spent $48!!! but it was worth it. well i go to texas in like 12 days then when i get back i have like 14 days till school starts and football season i love that time its so fun you know that? well it is. anywho i guess i will go now love me

> when i look at you i get this feeling inside > i don't know what comes over me > i cant get enough i keep wanting more > but, i know i cant go through this anymore > i want to be free > i want to fly away > i want to know love > the way its supposed to be > but then i see you over there > standing in the crowd > you take me by surprise when you catch my eye > i just turn away > i dont know what to say > i want to let go > i want to move on > i want to know love > the way it supposed to be > why do i put my self though this > i dont get it any more > sometimes i dream of what could be > the mystical world over takes me > i fly away to another time > another land some place no one can be found > and there we are sitting on the ground > you and me just how i want it to be > i want this to be real > i want to be seen > i want to know what your about > i want to know love > the way it supposed to be > i want what i want > i know its not right > i know its not good > i know it may never be > i just have a little dream > someday maybe i will know > maybe not with you > maybe not real soon > but one day i will know > the way love is supposed to be

i so love the song that i copyed on to my pg right under this. its such a great song and i wish i had a guy who felt like that about me that would be so cool. well anywho just thought id share this song with everyone cause its so good love me And I'd give up forever to touch you Cause I know that you feel me somehow You're the closest to heaven that I'll ever be And I don't want to go home right now And all I can taste is this moment And all I can breathe is your life Cause sooner or later it's over I just don't want to miss you tonight And I don't want the world to see me Cause I don't think that they'd understand When everything's made to be broken I just want you to know who I am And you can't fight the tears that ain't coming Or the moment of truth in your lies When everything feels like the movies Yeah you bleed just to know you're alive And I don't want the world to see me Cause I don't think that they'd understand When everything's made to be broken I just want you to know who I am

hey how are you all doing on this great day?? im happy as you can tell i talked to daniel on line and i saw jake and my friend daniel. and i had fun at church. but ya its cool the only thing is is that school starts in like 3 days im cool with it starting so i can see my friends but then we need summer u know go for 2 days then have summer agian. that would be soooo cool!! well this year is going to be so different but so fun. well i guess i will go love you all

ok i have so wrote so much in the last two days but i have nothen to do. oh ya my friend from church well i dont like him as anything but a friend so i wrote him and he totally feels the same and said it was odd to think of us becoming more then friends and it was i mean were great friends but nothing more i dont know how it would have worked anyway. so i feel better knowing that is done with. ok i have nothing to do at all. so how did you all like my two new poems?? a little different then what i usually write but they kinda just came to me so i wrote them. and dont worry im not planning on dieing any time soon. well i have to go now love me

she sits alone and wounders why why she cant help what shes feeling inside why does she hurt why does she cry why does she feel this way inside she drinks away her pain sip by sip its slowly dulled away she has some fun while she feels so great but when its over its more then she can take so she drinks more and more everyday as she lives her life like one big game time goes on while she sits alone her friends are gone shes been disowned time cant heal the way she feels her pain is so deep her mind to far gone she starts to worry as she starts to drive she sees the tree shes about to die she knows its over she knows why she wont feel a thing because shes too high her last few seconds she can only wish things would change she wishes she could have got help with her pain as she drifts away she says her last goodbye hoping mabey some how some one will hear her parents are called she is no more tears fall down for this young girl every ones last word is why why did this happen why did she hurt why did she die why did she feel this way inside???

hey guys how are you all doing today?? im good here just sitten at home doing nothen really. i have to do the kitchen soon but hey i have all day. dude this summer went by almost to fast if you think about it. it feels like i was just leaving school. but it has been a couple of months and i have done alot in those couple of months. mostly live out of my suitcase. but hey its all good i had a great summer and if i could i would do it all over agian then i would and i wouldnt change any of it. but you know what kinda makes me sad is next summer is like my last real summer. its so wierd to think that in two years i will be leaving almost all of my friends and starting over agian. just as i finally get used to the way things are there gunna change on me. i dont know how much i like that its kinda scary. oh well life goes on. but i dont know what im going to do for college any more i may just end up going to asu. i dont really want to i want to go to a tech school in cali but dude its like alot of money. i hope it all works out!! well i guess im going to go now love tonz me

twisted and confused she doesnt know what to do she walks her life as thought shes not there she smiles and plays it all off but her pain is so deep and it hurts her so bad she cant even tell her own mom and dad there fighting is hard to hear ever night she cries in her room with no one to turn to she finally says enough is enough as she takes her own life the fighting goes on all through the night her cold body is not found till its light but by then it is far to late her grave is to soon and the inscription is small all it says is how sorry they are but sorry doesnt help when you cant hear the words twisted and confused she walked through her life as there fighting slowly took her life

Hey ya'll! wazzup? n2mh. well i had the funnest day 2 day. i went 2 the pool w/dillion, lauren, and danielle. lauren kept sayin *awww they're flirtin!* i waz like -_- we all wonder why lauren...boy sumtimes she can b such a blonde...^_^ u kno wat i mean britt. yea dillion and i started to rap 2gether. ^.^ u kno the song "slow motion" by cashmoney? thats wat we started to rap. lol it waz quite...interesting. well *kisses and hugs* luvya all! All i ever wanted was to be a part of your heart, And for us to be together, never apart No one else in the world can even compare, You're perfect and so is this love that we share. We have so much more than I ever thought we would, I love you more than I ever thought I could. I promise to give you all I have to give, I'll do anything for you as long as I live. In your eyes I see our present, our future and past, By the way you look at me I know we will last. I hope that one day you'll come to realize, How perfect you are when seen through my eyes. - Ashley Borden - Don't u just luv that poem? I do...i dunno if i can relate to that YET but newayz...post ur comments on it if u want. Have fun!

heya sweeties, wazzup? n2mh! well im leavin tuesday at 9:15am! >brokengurl13 >^

Love easily breaks A heart once whole, Love easily takes A happy soul And once it rips my heart apart Sewing of stitches gingerly start To heal a scarred and roughed up heart So tattered and torn by every thorn And finally when the day is done And when the moon has hid the sun I toss and turn within my bed The voices echo in my head I see his face surrounding me "Stop haunting me!" I scream and pleed He shakes his and sneers at me "Not til you say the magic please!" I say a please; he laughs coldly "I'll never leave!" he taunts at me So then I punch his pretty face I look at his ruins with distaste I spit and say, "You were such a waste." Then dawn breaks thru the silent dark A cheerful song brought by a lark I wake up very drowsily And make my bed so groggily The sun sheds light into my day A smile slowly plays across my face I sigh with relief and throw my arms out An angel holds me and with no doubts He takes me to a better place where smiles are always on my face >brokengurl13 > I made that one up last nite and it took me from 9 - 11pm to come up w/this..but i think its pretty good. well plz post ur comments!

heya sweeties! YAY im back from hawaii! lol i saw my friend named kirby that i hadnt seen in a LONG time! lol hes pretty hot. dont worry im not cheatin on dillion. i went 2 his football practice...but i didnt get a hi even! -_- o well he waz hangin out w/his homies. thats how most guyz r, but even iggie came over and said hi. o well boyz can b so konfusing. soooo im about 3 shades darker than usual now...and im reluctant 2 go back 2 skul. o well i g2g luvya alls lots! mwah! malia
